title: How to set local AOSP Gerrit server – Part 1
description: In this tutorial I’ll explain how to set a local gerrit server that hosts Android source code. After completing the tutorial you’ll have a fully runnable local AOSP mirror with local Gerrit server. First thing first. we need a Linux server. if you don’t have one available, you can use a pre-installed Ubuntu 15.04 Server I […]
